name: Graveyard Hoops
description:
A two-players-on-one-pc game of basketball set in a graveyard.

Grab the glowing 'life-energy' and dunk your pumpkin in your opponent's goal-cauldron to score. Bump into your opponent to steal the energy from them.

Hurry up as games only last for ONE MINUTE.

Controls:

LEFT (green) player: ASDW

RIGHT (red) player: Cursor Keys

Left and right add spin to your pumpkin

'Down' knocks your pumpkin onto the ground

'Up' sweeps with your witches broom/goalkeeper

Assets I used:

FREE Cartoon Halloween Pack

Breakable Spooky Pumpkins

Cartoon FX Remaster Free
